column1: #text=I waited in the airport until it was time for the passengers to board the plane .
#text=I went up with the other passengers and stood in line .
#text=We all had to show our boarding passes at the gate .
#text=Once we 'd done that , we were allowed to board a plane .
#text=We all walked down a short hallway that connected the airport to the plane itself .
#text=As we walked in the door of the plane , a stewardess and a pilot both said hello to us .
#text=I walked down the narrow aisle of the plane until I found my seat number , which was near the plane 's right wing .
#text=I put the bag I was carrying in an overhead compartment near my seat and sat down next to the window .
#text=Soon the plane was taxiing to take off , which means that it was essentially driving to the runway .
#text=Once there , the plane got the go ahead to take off .
#text=It started going really , really fast , and then suddenly it was off the ground and quickly gaining elevation .
#text=I looked out the window and saw the airport and the neighborhood nearby , the streets and cars and fields all get smaller and smaller , until they did n't look real anymore .
#text=During that time the stewardesses passed around sodas , and people who wanted to eat ordered things like bags of peanuts .
#text=I ate a granola bar I 'd taken with me and watched part of a movie that they were showing .
#text=The plane started to descend , more and more .
#text=It taxied for a while and then finally came to a stop .
#text=People got up and got their bags from the overhead compartments .
#text=The aisle was very crowded at this point .
#text=When the doors were opened we all got out of the plane and made our way to the airport and , from there , to wherever we all were going .
